headline.main: CHIANG OPTIMISTIC ON 'FINAL VICTORY'; Generalissimo Stresses That for 5 Years He Has Been Confident of Outcome PLEASED BY AMERICAN AID Says New Treaties With Britain and U.S. Are Progressing With No Sources of Irritation

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Dec. 27 (Delayed) -- If the somber city of Chungking is fairly bright with optimism this Winter the reason is not hard to find. Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek, leader of China, is personally optimistic.
abstract: Chiang Kai-shek repts treaties with US and GB progressing smoothly
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Dec. 27 (Delayed) -- If the somber city of Chungking is fairly bright with optimism this Winter the reason is not hard to find. Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek, leader of China, is personally optimistic....

byline.original: By BROOKS ATKINSONWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
